edited_stories.edited_story_text: For the triathlon, we swam in the ocean. Next, we had to complete the bicycling portion of the event. While running, the athletes got very hot and used water to cool down. Luckily, there were volunteers to provide water to the athletes. Many awards were given out after the race.
